features: 【Razor-Sharp & Stylish】This meat knife is made of our specially-made high carbon steel ATS-34, forged by blacksmiths with decades of experience, who precisely control high temperature, constant temperature, and quick chill, achieving 58±2 Rockwell Hardness. Such conditions make this grill knife hard, tough. It is a ruthless butcher for food materials. To maintain your knife, please keep it clean and dry after each use and put it in a dry and well-ventilated place.

【Designer's Message】This meat-cutting knife is named Beyond The Clouds (雲にのる), derived from it is as mysterious as the sea, as beautiful as the Milky Way, cutting through all the fog for you. Abstract textures are so clear due to the modern laser technology based on traditional forging crafts. Cut fruit, with less juice; cut vegetable leaves, thin; cut the meat, steadily fast. A small hole is designed for hanging on the wall and buffering the force when chopping bones to a certain extent.

【An Oak Handle Made for You】Special handle shape design, perfectly fits into the palm of your hand, just like designed for you. Take Japanese-style oak to be the handle, comfortable like human skin, but not slippery. The full Tang design with 3 rivets makes it stable like a mountain. Compared with other vegetable knives, you can insist on using them for a longer time. The cooking knife is matched with an exquisite leather sheath, portable for you to carry out for a picnic, camping, BBQ, Hiking, etc.

【Thoughtful Gift Choice】Are you stuck for a gift for your friend or lovers? This japanese cleaver knife deserves to be your first choice for three reasons: first, with exquisite gift box packaging, it is decent and full of surprise; second, the fascinating pattern on the blade shows its specialness; Third, its quality is far more than its price. Huusk chef knives will give you a different experience. You can prepare this gift for Christmas, Thanksgiving Day, and other suitable occasions for giving gifts.

【HUUSK Guarantee】Huusk is founded in 1994, and focused on huusk japan knife manufacturing, pursuing quality and skill. Huusk always persists in one thing - forging sharp and durable knives with scrupulous attitudes, which is our lifelong pursuit. We promise a 30-day free return without any reason and a 12-month warranty. If you find any please contact us immediately by email. THIS IS A LIFETIME GUARANTEE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my brother as a birthday present because I loved the one my husband bought me for Christmas. He loved it. He has used it multiple times with no issues and loves how sharp it if. I think he has mainly used it on meat so far but has had no issues. I took this thing out of the package when it arrived just to see it as it was one, I was looking at purchasing. I will say it is a beautiful knife. I am one of those people who love a good knife and won't particularly use a knife if it doesn't fit my hand well, but this knife is a keeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heavy, thick blade.
reviews.reviewText: Heavy knife with good handle. Wasn’t very sharp when it arrived. It was packaged in a plastic bag with some kind of sticky coating on the blade. Took a lot of time to strip the bag off a piece at a time. Still haven’t removed all the sticky gunk on the blade after 4 washes. I’ll have to be more aggressive with thinner Or acetone to get it cleaned off I guess. Good knife for the money but I’d rather have paid a little more and gotten a knife that wasn’t such a pain in the ass to get in usable order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This knife exceeded my expectation for the price. It is beautiful, and cuts through thick beef steaks like butter. This knife is a perfect gift for all the manly men in your family. I bought three more for Christmas gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this knife!
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect and quality knife! I am really impressed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this knife. It’s my go to cooking knife. Super sharp and great handling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fancy Cut My Vegetables Easily Fancy Skin My Deer & Hogs
reviews.reviewText: Once this knife got here, it hasn't left my hands from vegetables, roots for medicine to skinning and dressing out hogs, deer and did I say I just love this knife so much? My other knives are getting lonely. I keep them all in wooden box with packet of silica and I do put a little sesame oil on handles and on blades. But I use this Huusk Japan Knife Hand Forged Meat Cleaver so much it never goes in the box. I dry it off after each use. Nothing like a great knife you love. I love Huusk Japan Knife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pros and cons
reviews.reviewText: Knife is easy to hold good grip and is sharp but to bulky for the kitchen maybe is better buy to use for outdoors or for camping

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen material pero sin filo de origen
reviews.reviewText: De entrada equivoqué mi compra, ocupaba algo más de corte fino, al momento de tener 4mm en la parte superior impide trabajar cortes delgados, pero eso fue tema mio no de producto, lo que no me gustó nada es que el cuchillo de origen no trae filo y eso no me parece nada correcto
el cuchillo llega como manchado de grasa y no tiene el suficiente filo
Fué regalo para una persona, le encantó, lo lleva a donde vaya, ya varios se han interesado en éste cuchillo. Tiene muy buen filo y es muy práctico.
Me gustó el cuchillo pero tiene detalles, la pintura negra se despintó muy pronto y me entregaron el producto sucio, parecía haber sido usado y no lo limpiaron
